mapper.update: update FT_File_Vesion set R_FILE_ID = #{rFileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, VERSION_SM = #{versionSm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_MD5 = #{fileMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_SIZE = #{fileSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COM_ID = #{comId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEL_FLG = #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, UP_USER = #{upUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UP_DATE = #{upDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CR_USER = #{crUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CR_DATE = #{crDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, R_FILE_ID, VERSION_SM, FILE_MD5, REMARK, FILE_SIZE, COM_ID, DEL_FLG, UP_USER, UP_DATE, CR_USER, CR_DATE from FT_File_Vesion where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select ID, R_FILE_ID, VERSION_SM, FILE_MD5, REMARK, FILE_SIZE, COM_ID, DEL_FLG, UP_USER, UP_DATE, CR_USER, CR_DATE from FT_File_Vesion
